titleStmt.title: A most godly and comfortable ballad of the glorious resurrection of our Lord Iesus Christ, how he triumphed over death, hell, and sinne, whereby we are certainly perswaded of our rising againe from the dead. To the tune of Rogero.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Coules dwelling at the lower end of the Old Bayley.,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the lower end of the Old Bayley.
